name: Cherry Almond Smoothie
description: This dairy-free smoothie serves well at breakfast or as an afternoon snack.
keywords: almond meal, almond milk, cherries, healthy, raw, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup almond meal, also called almond flour or almond powder 3/4 ounce

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender, and blend until smooth.
